mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.vari_id AS "varietyInfo.id", bvi.name AS "varietyInfo.name", a.service_factor AS "serviceFactor", a.min_qty AS "minQty", a.max_qty AS "maxQty", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN biz_variety_info bvi ON bvi.id = a.vari_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_variety_factor( id, vari_id, service_factor, min_qty, max_qty, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{varietyInfo.id}, #{serviceFactor}, #{minQty}, #{maxQty}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_variety_factor SET vari_id = #{varietyInfo.id}, service_factor = #{serviceFactor}, min_qty = #{minQty}, max_qty = #{maxQty}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
